trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SAML 断言中的 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> 元素，包含 SAML 授权机构提供的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: The `<saml:Advice>` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens.
trans-unit.target: SAML 断言中的 `<saml:Advice>` 元素是 SAML 令牌的扩展点。

trans-unit.source: One example of how to use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> class is to provide supporting information about the SAML authority issuing the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关颁发 SAML 断言的 SAML 授权机构的支持信息，是 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> 类的一个使用示例。

trans-unit.source: This supporting information can be in the form of a SAML assertion or a reference to a SAML assertion, which are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 这些支持信息的形式可以是 SAML 断言或对 SAML 断言的引用，这两种形式分别由 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 属性表示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is called and the instance is not modified prior to serializing it into XML by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method, an empty `<saml:Advice>` element is generated by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此构造函数，并且在通过调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> 方法将实例序列化为 XML 之前未修改实例，则 `<saml:Advice>` 方法生成一个空 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> 元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" /> that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" />，包含提供 SAML 断言附加信息的 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> class using the specified collection of SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 SAML 断言集合初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `assertions` 参数的元素添加到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assertions" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assertions" /> 包含一个 <see langword="null" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含对提供 SAML 断言附加信息的 SAML 断言的引用集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `references` 参数的元素添加到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="references" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="references" /> 包含一个 <see langword="null" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含对提供 SAML 断言附加信息的 SAML 断言的引用集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" /> that contains SAML assertions that provide additional information for a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" />，包含提供 SAML 断言附加信息的 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> class using the specified collections of SAML assertions and SAML assertion references.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 SAML 断言集合和 SAML 断言引用集合初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `references` 参数的元素添加到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `assertions` 参数的元素添加到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="references" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="references" /> 包含一个 <see langword="null" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assertions" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assertions" /> 包含一个 <see langword="null" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of references to SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 SAML 断言的引用集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含对提供 SAML 断言附加信息的 SAML 断言的引用集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:AssertionIDReference>` child element of the `<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 属性对应于 OASIS SAML 1.1 规范的“断言和协议”中定义的 `<saml:AssertionIDReference>` 元素的 `<saml:Advice>` 子元素。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> 属性的值为 `true`，则 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 属性返回的集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SAML 断言的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" /> that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" />，包含提供 SAML 断言附加信息的 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:Assertion>` child element of the `<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 属性对应于 OASIS SAML 1.1 规范的“断言和协议”中定义的 `<saml:Assertion>` 元素的 `<saml:Advice>` 子元素。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> 属性的值为 `true`，则 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 属性返回的集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此实例的属性是否是只读的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例的属性是只读的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> 类的此实例设为只读，请调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 将此实例设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法，则 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> 属性被设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> to read the <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> XML element.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于读取 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> XML 元素的 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />，它能够读取 SAML 断言中已在 SAML 规范内定义的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> that determines the security token that created the digital signature for SAML assertions that contain this <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> XML element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />，它确定为包含此 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> XML 元素的 SAML 断言创建数字签名的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: Reads the <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> XML element using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 读取器读取 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 为 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="samlSerializer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> element does not conform to the XML schema for the <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> 元素不符合 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> 元素的 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> to write the <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于写入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 元素的 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of writing the <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> element and its child elements and attributes that are defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />，它能够写入 SAML 规范中定义的 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> 元素及其子元素和属性。

trans-unit.source: Writes this <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> into the specified XML writer as an <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice" /> 作为一个 <see langword="<saml:Advice>" /> 元素写入指定的 XML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="samlSerializer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />
